text: Gulzar Ahmed (died 26 November 2019) was a politician in the Sunamganj District of the Sylhet Division of Bangladesh. He was elected Member of Parliament from Sunamganj-3 constituency for the Bangladesh Nationalist Party in the Sixth Jatiya Sangsad elections held on 15 February 1996. == Birth and early life == Gulzar Ahmed was born in the Sunamganj District of the Sylhet Division in Bangladesh. == Political life == Gulzar Ahmed was a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician. He was elected Member of Parliament from Sunamganj-3 constituency for the Bangladesh Nationalist Party in the Sixth Jatiya Sangsad elections held on 15 February 1996. ==Death== Ahmed died on 26 November 2019. == See also == * Sunamganj-3 * February 1996 Bangladeshi general election == References == == External links == * List of 6th Parliament Members – Bangladesh parliament Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Sunamganj District Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:6th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing Category:Place of death missing
title: Gulzar Ahmed (Sunamganj politician)
